pageSetting.title: 客户存贷款企业规模分析

attribute.value: select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'ZHLX'

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ SELECT $tjrq$ AS TJRQ, JG.JGDH AS JGDH, JG.JGMC AS JGMC, B.KHYE AS HZYE, (cast(B.KHYE as decimal(25,4))/cast( SUM(DGTJ.KHYE) OVER(PARTITION BY DGTJ.TJRQ,DGTJ.JXDXLX) as decimal(25,4)))*100 AS HZHYYEZB, B.KHS AS HZKHS, (cast(B.KHS as decimal(25,4))/cast( SUM(DGTJ.KHS) OVER(PARTITION BY DGTJ.TJRQ,DGTJ.JXDXLX) as decimal(25,4)))*100 AS HZHYKHSZB, DMMS.DMMS AS DMMS, DMMS.DMZ AS DMZ, DGTJ.KHYE AS dd1, case when b.khye =0 then 0 else (DGTJ.KHYE/B.KHYE)*100 end as dd, DGTJ.KHS AS dd2, case when b.khs =0 then 0 else (cast(dgtj.khs as decimal(25,4))/cast(b.khs as decimal(25,4)))*100 end as zb FROM KHFX_DGKHQYGMTJ DGTJ INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH=DGTJ.JGKHDXDH INNER JOIN( SELECT a.jgkhdxdh,cast(sum(a.khs)as decimal(25,4)) as khs, cast(sum(a.khye)as decimal(25,4)) as khye from( SELECT DGTJ2.JGKHDXDH,dgtj2.khs ,dgtj2.khye FROM KHFX_DGKHQYGMTJ DGTJ2 WHERE DGTJ2.TJRQ = (SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND DGTJ2.JGKHDXDH IN ($jgkhdxdh$) AND DGTJ2.JXDXLX= $ywlx$ )A GROUP BY A.JGKHDXDH )B ON B.JGKHDXDH = DGTJ.JGKHDXDH inner join csb_dmms dmms on dmms.dmz = dgtj.qygm and dmms.DMMC= 'QYGM' WHERE DGTJ.TJRQ = (SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND DGTJ.JGKHDXDH in ($jgkhdxdh$) and DGTJ.JXDXLX= $ywlx$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( SELECT $tjrq$ AS TJRQ, JG.JGDH AS JGDH, JG.JGMC AS JGMC, B.KHYE AS HZYE, (cast(B.KHYE as decimal(25,4))/cast( SUM(DGTJ.KHYE) OVER(PARTITION BY DGTJ.TJRQ,DGTJ.JXDXLX) as decimal(25,4)))*100 AS HZHYYEZB, B.KHS AS HZKHS, (cast(B.KHS as decimal(25,4))/cast( SUM(DGTJ.KHS) OVER(PARTITION BY DGTJ.TJRQ,DGTJ.JXDXLX) as decimal(25,4)))*100 AS HZHYKHSZB, DMMS.DMMS AS DMMS, DMMS.DMZ AS DMZ, DGTJ.KHYE AS dd1, case when b.khye =0 then 0 else (DGTJ.KHYE/B.KHYE)*100 end as dd, DGTJ.KHS AS dd2, case when b.khs =0 then 0 else (cast(dgtj.khs as decimal(25,4))/cast(b.khs as decimal(25,4)))*100 end as zb FROM KHFX_DGKHQYGMTJ DGTJ INNER JOIN KHDX_JG JG ON JG.KHDXDH=DGTJ.JGKHDXDH INNER JOIN( SELECT a.jgkhdxdh,cast(sum(a.khs)as decimal(25,4)) as khs, cast(sum(a.khye)as decimal(25,4)) as khye from( SELECT DGTJ2.JGKHDXDH,dgtj2.khs ,dgtj2.khye FROM KHFX_DGKHQYGMTJ DGTJ2 WHERE DGTJ2.TJRQ = (SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND DGTJ2.JGKHDXDH IN ($jgkhdxdh$) AND DGTJ2.JXDXLX= $ywlx$ )A GROUP BY A.JGKHDXDH )B ON B.JGKHDXDH = DGTJ.JGKHDXDH inner join csb_dmms dmms on dmms.dmz = dgtj.qygm and dmms.DMMC= 'QYGM' WHERE DGTJ.TJRQ = (SELECT YM FROM CSB_SJW WHERE TJRQ=CAST(cast($tjrq$ as char(6))||'01' AS INTEGER) ) AND DGTJ.JGKHDXDH in ($jgkhdxdh$) and DGTJ.JXDXLX= $ywlx$ ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from CSB_DMMS where DMMC= 'ZHLX'
